title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for answer with reason

g''(x)>0 for 0.3<x<1 Therefore the line tangent to the graph of g at x=0.3 lies below the graph of g for 0.3<x<1.
descriptions:

1 point is earned for answer with reason

g''(x)>0 for 0.3<x<1

Therefore the line tangent to the graph of g at x=0.3 lies below the graph of g for 0.3<x<1.

Therefore the line tangent to the graph of g at x=0.3 lies below the graph of g for 0.3<x<1.
